product_name: Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer Down Jacket - Women's
long_description: Weighing a mere 6 oz., the Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down jacket for women is warm and truly ultralight, thanks to its featherweight shell and water-repellent 850-fill-power down. Q.Shield(TM) DOWN treatment protects individual down fibers from moisture so they keep you warm even when wet. Premium 850-fill-power down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Quilted construction with lightweight nylon shell fabric holds insulation in place. Zippered handwarmer pockets. Lightweight single-pull hem drawcord. Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down jacket for women stows in its own pocket.
short_description: Weighing a mere 6 oz., the Mountain Hardwear Ghost Whisperer down jacket for women is warm and truly ultralight, thanks to its featherweight shell and water-repellent 850-fill-power down.
